info.title: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set API
info.description: Logical Model representing Dublin Core metadata elements as defined at https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/

get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-DublinCore
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-DublinCore.

StructureDefinition-DublinCore.title: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set
StructureDefinition-DublinCore.description: Logical Model representing Dublin Core metadata elements as defined at https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/

resourceType.description: Resource type identifier for DublinCore logical model

title.description: A name given to the resource

creator.description: An entity responsible for making the resource

publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available

contributor.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource

date.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource

type.description: The nature or genre of the resource

format.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context

source.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived

coverage.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

rights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource
